title: New: Finite – Infinity Falling
body:
So many people underestimate the effect that Casiotone For The Painfully Alone has had on modern music.

Delaware’s **Finite** draws from CFTPA on his debut track, _Infinity Falling_, alongside more recent influences, such as **Baths** or **Majical Cloudz**, through the minimal nature of the track and half muttered, half whispered vocals. Alongside the beautiful artwork, _Infinity Falling_ is a mightily impressive first move.

_segments of scenes and noise disrupt the void  / pieces are now in place / show me what I’m falling toward_
